name: SuperHeroes
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super heroes
Developer Terms of Use
des: This Heroes skill can be used for teenagers/adults in parties, etc. Where there comes situation to choose(Head or tail like for groups) then this skill makes it easy to map a hero to one individual as every time you ask for hero it will generate random new hero for you also used to select roleplay, playing activities, etc. Invoke it by "Alexa, open super heroes" it generate a Hero and ask for another one, where you will have option for Yes or No to continue again.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
